meanings.definition: A person or thing that gets something.
meanings.sent1: The getter of the award was very happy.
meanings.sent2: The mail getter collects letters from the mailbox.
meanings.sent3: The cookie getter in our house is always the first to the jar.
meanings.sent4: She was a getter of hearts, always charming those around her.
meanings.sent5: The getter of knowledge never stops learning new things.

meanings.definition: A device or material used to absorb or remove impurities.
meanings.sent1: The vacuum cleaner has a special getter for dust particles.
meanings.sent2: The water filter uses a getter to purify the water.
meanings.sent3: The sponge was the ultimate getter of spills in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The air purifier acts as a getter, cleaning the air we breathe.
meanings.sent5: The magnet served as a getter, attracting all the metal pieces.
